description: Tmvel Universal HDMI to Composite / AV Video Converter, Support PAL / NTSC Standard TV PS3 VHS VCR DVD Player - Outstanding Quality & Performance. To help users convert the high quality of the HDMI video signal into normal CVBS signal (standard-definition 480i, 576i,).So that can play on TV, VHS VCR, DVD recorders, etc. and support NTSC and PAL two TV format. Features: No need to install drivers, portable, flexible, plug and play. Low power, No power adapter. Support NTSC and PAL two standard TV formats output. Compatible HDMI1.3 Specifications: Input ports: 1xRCA (Yellow, White, Red). Output ports: 1xRCA (Yellow, White, Red). Dimensions(mm): 72(D)x55(W)x20(H) Weight (g): 40 Composite input: PAL,NTSC3.58,NTSC4.43,SECAM,PAL/M,PAL/N. Composite output: PAL,NTSC. Package Content Tmvel HDMI to AV Converter) USB Cable User Manual
title: Tmvel Universal HDMI to Composite / AV Video Converter, Support PAL / NTSC Multi-System Standard TV PS3 VHS VCR DVD Player - Outstanding Quality & Performance - Multi-System Video Converter/Video Conversion
